name: starter-restaurant
description: Next.js 14 restaurant starter with menu, reservations, chef team, and testimonials. TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router, shadcn/ui theming.
postMessage:
Restaurant starter installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npm run dev

Customize your restaurant by editing lib/data.ts (menu items, chefs, testimonials) and replace placeholder SVGs with real images.

shadcn/ui is pre-configured â€” run `npx shadcn@latest add <component>` to add components.
